## Who I help

-   Researchers working with messy data

-   Students learning R or statistics

-   Healthcare and pharmacy industry teams needing analysis or forecasting

-   Anyone overwhelmed by data and spreadsheets
:::

::: box
## How it works

-   You send an enquiry describing your project or data

-   We discuss your goals and timeline

-   I analyse or build your solution in R

-   You receive clean data, code and clear explanations
:::

::: box
## Tools

-   R / tidyverse
-   ggplot2
-   Shiny
-   Quarto / R Markdown
-   Statistical modelling
-   Forecasting (ARIMA, Prophet)
-   Healthcare & pharmacy data
:::
